channel.title: U.S. Police Shooting News Tracker
channel.description: Automated news aggregation tracking police-involved shootings in the United States

item.title: ICE Agent Kills U.S. Citizen as She Tries to Drive Away After Another ICE Agent Attempts to Open Her Car Door
item.description: "[DHS is] already trying to spin this as an action of self-defense," Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey said following the shooting. "Having seen the video myself, I want to tell everybody directly that is bullshit."

item.title: Man with machete shot and killed by police, who then find 3 more dead inside home: officials
item.description: Police shot and killed an individual armed with a knife in the Garden State on Monday, the New Jersey state attorney general's office noted in a press release.

item.title: Northridge man killed by ICE agent on NYE was an ‘active shooter,’ officials say — as family claims he was celebrating
item.description: Homeland Security says the agent was fired at by the reveler during an “active shooter situation.”

item.title: Off-duty deputy shot and killed while working security job in Texas, suspect apprehended
item.description: Off-duty Caldwell County deputy shot and killed while working security at a nightclub in Austin, Texs. Police investigation ongoing.

item.title: Off-duty deputy shot and killed while working security job in Texas, suspect remains at large
item.description: Off-duty Caldwell County deputy shot and killed while working security at a nightclub in Austin, Texs. Police investigation ongoing.

item.title: Off-duty ICE officer allegedly shoots and kills man firing gun outside apartment complex: DHS - ABC News
item.description: Off-duty ICE officer allegedly shoots and kills man firing gun outside apartment complex: DHSABC News Off-duty ICE agent shoots, kills man allegedly armed with rifle in NorthridgeABC7 Los Angeles Gunman dies after being shot by off-duty ICE agent; LAPD invest…

item.title: Off-duty DHS agent fatally shoots armed neighbor in New Year’s Eve dispute
item.description: A New Year’s Eve gun call in a quiet Northridge block after an off-duty federal agent shot and killed an armed neighbor during a late-night police response, authorities said.

item.title: Police officer shoots, kills man who fled traffic stop
item.description: The 30-year-old man allegedly said he was armed during a foot pursuit, police say.

item.title: Federal Judge Throws Out Indictment of TikToker Shot by ICE Agent
item.description: Carlitos Ricardo Parias—the TikTok streamer and immigration journalist who was shot by ICE in south Los Angeles this October—has had his indictment dropped by a federal judge.U.S. District Judge Fernando M. Olgin on Saturday dismissed the indictment on the gr…

item.title: Large police presence in Pittsburgh’s Shadyside neighborhood; public asked to avoid area
item.description: The public is asked to avoid an area of Pittsburgh’s Shadyside neighborhood after an officer-involved shooting.

item.title: Man shot by off-duty officer at Atlanta apartment complex, police say
item.description: The Georgia Bureau of Investigation is investigating an officer-involved shooting that happened late Christmas Eve at a northwest Atlanta apartment complex, officials said.

item.title: Armed man in mental health crisis shot dead by Springfield officer, police say
item.description: The Hampden County District Attorney's Office is investigating a fatal officer-involved shooting that happened Saturday afternoon in Springfield.

item.title: Weezer Bassist’s Wife Breaks Silence After Being Shot By Police
item.description: Weezer bassist Scott Shriner‘s estranged wife, Jillian Lauren, has revealed that her “world fell to pieces” after being shot by police in Los Angeles in April. “It’s like, you spend your whole life just getting an entire deck of cards in order. And just take …

item.title: Sacramento forks over $160k after cops kill blade-brandishing madman
item.description: The city agreed to pay $160,000 to the father of 44-year-old Dante Dwaine Day, who was fatally shot by police on a light rail train in August 2023 near Sacramento City College.

item.title: Augusta County man's identification confirmed after fatal warrant service
item.description: The Medical Examiner's Office has confirmed the identity of the suspect who died in an officer-involved shooting on Dec. 17 in Augusta County.

item.title: Officer-involved shooting reported in Gwinnett County
item.description: Gwinnett County authorities are responding to an officer-involved shooting.

item.title: Shooting reported after US Border Patrol agents involved in 'struggle' near Texas riverbank: sheriff's office
item.description: Texas Rangers investigate officer-involved shooting with U.S. Border Patrol agents near a Midway riverbank. Breaking news story developing with scene secured.
